infoOn

public static void infoOn(String message,
                          Widget target)
Displays an info message centered horizontally on the page and centered vertically on the specified target widget.

error

public static void error(String message)
Displays error feedback to the user in a non-offensive way.

errorNear

public static void errorNear(String message,
                             Widget source)
Displays error feedback to the user in a non-offensive way. The error feedback is displayed near the supplied component and if the component supports focus, it is focused.

showNear

public static void showNear(PopupPanel popup,
                            Widget target)
Shows the supplied popup panel near the specified target.

showOver

public static void showOver(PopupPanel popup,
                            Widget target)
Shows the supplied popup panel over the specified target.

centerOn

public static PopupPanel centerOn(PopupPanel popup,
                                  Widget centerOn)
Centers the supplied vertically on the supplied trigger widget. The popup's showing state will be preserved.

centerOn

public static PopupPanel centerOn(PopupPanel popup,
                                  int ypos)
Centers the supplied vertically on the supplied trigger widget. The popup's showing state will be preserved.

Returns:
the supplied popup.

newPopup

public static PopupPanel newPopup(String styleName,
                                  Widget contents)
Creates and returns a new popup with the specified style name and contents.

newPopupNear

public static PopupPanel newPopupNear(String styleName,
                                      Widget contents,
                                      Widget target)
Creates a new popup with the specified style name and contents and shows it near the specified target widget. Returns the newly created popup.

createHider

public static ClickHandler createHider(PopupPanel popup)
Creates a click handler that hides the specified popup. Useful when creating popups that behave like menus.
